body_html:
@tryerrorman what version of PIL are you using? From a closer inspection of the error, it seems that the context manager support of the PIL Image class is missing.
I checked the source code for the Image class and it does have context manager support.

I checked the source code for the Image class and it does have context manager support.
body:
@tryerrorman what version of PIL are you using? From a closer inspection of the error, it seems that the context manager support of the PIL Image class is missing.
I checked the source code for the Image class and it does have context manager support.
